overview: The war took hold of the city. Shangri-La, the garden was peaceful. The gatekeeper stoodguard for the garden like any other day. He duly performed his duties. One day, an old man came as a visitor. But without a ticket. He reached there, determined that the garden was his last hope. But, the young guard stood firm in his ideals denying entry to the old man. A day of realisations, the guard was about to contemplate existence as a mysterious medley of time and space.
title: Allusion
